thread.title: Houghton and Hancock Prepare for New Year’s 2024 Celebrations with Sparkling Wine Tasting and ‘Chook Drop’ Event
thread.title_full: Houghton and Hancock Prepare for New Year’s 2024 Celebrations with Sparkling Wine Tasting and ‘Chook Drop’ Event

author: Marissa Blackwood
title: Houghton and Hancock Prepare for New Year’s 2024 Celebrations with Sparkling Wine Tasting and ‘Chook Drop’ Event
text:
Houghton and Hancock Gear Up for New Year’s Weekend Celebrations in 2024
Sparkling Wine Tasting at Keweenaw Co-op
On Saturday, the Keweenaw Co-op will be hosting a Sparkling Wine Tasting event, featuring a French Brut, a White Lambrusco, and a Grace Brut Rose from Mawby Winery. In addition to wines, there will also be grape beer and sparkling teas available for sampling. This is a great opportunity to try something new for the start of the new year, and the sampling will run from noon until 2:00 p.m.
Chook Drop Event on the Downtown Waterfront Pier
On Sunday evening, the City of Houghton and Visit Keweenaw will be hosting a unique New Year’s arrival event on the downtown waterfront pier. The event, known as the ‘Chook Drop’, will involve dropping a large Chook hat at midnight to ring in 2024. Attendees are encouraged to arrive by at least 11:30 p.m. for the full experience, which will include live music and mingling with fellow chook-drop watchers.
Celebrate the New Year Outdoors
The Chook Drop event provides a great alternative for people on New Year’s Eve, allowing them to enjoy live music and outdoor festivities. This event is a unique way to welcome the new year and is sure to be a memorable experience for all who attend.
